result.markdown: --- title: "measr" author: - Jake Thompson date: 2023-05-27 slug: measr image: featured.jpg alias: - /project/measr/ categories: - R - package - grant - dcm - Stan description: "Bayesian psychometric measurement using Stan" abstract: '' engine: knitr links: - icon: globe name: website url: https://taylor.wjakethompson.com - icon: github name: code url: https://github.com/wjakethompson/taylor --- ## measr measr is an *R* package funded by the [Institute of Education Sciences](https://ies.ed.gov/) for estimating diagnostic classification models (also called cognitive diagnostic models) with [Stan](https://mc-stan.org). Diagnostic classification models are confirmatory latent class models, as described by [Rupp et al. (2010)](https://jonathantemplin.com/diagnostic-measurement-theory-methods-applications/), [Bradshaw (2016)](https://doi.org/10.1002/9781118956588.ch13), and [de la Torre and Sorrel (2023)](https://doi.org/10.1017/9781108902724.010). measr automatically generates the Stan code necessary for a variety of diagnostic models, estimates the model, and provides functionality to evaluate the model's performance using model fit indices, information criteria, and reliability metrics.
